channel.title: Log out problem
channel.description:
I click on Logout button one time then nothing happends, i click 10+ times then it will log me out,but i see on server that i'm still logged in and when i try to log in back it says to wait 60 seconds , after 60 seconds wont connect me.This never happen before.
[URL=http://img175.imageshack.us/i/60496054.jpg/][IMG]http://img175.imageshack.us/img175/253/60496054.jpg[/img][/URL]

item.title: Log out problem
item.dc:creator: @wonderspring wonderspring
item.description:
@wonderspring wrote:

you have the method in client.java from server side.

Open up the file - CTRL+F and search for public void logout then replace that method with the one from pure2ownage

Read full topic

item.title: Log out problem
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

change your logout method to this.

public void logout() { try { killMyNPCs(); if(inPitsGame){ inPitsGame = false; PlayerHandler.playersInPit -= 1; println_debug(playerName + " resetted pits!"); } if (inTrade) declineTrade(true); resetfollowers(); savegame(true); disconnected = true; if(this != null) { outStream.createFrame(109); flushOutStream(); } } catch (Exception Ex_) { } }

Read full topic
